name: Cash_Out (Demo Day 7)
description:
just a quick demo thrown together

quickplay this time, don't think having career mode last time worked out to well

going to be honest not a lot has changed but the game does play better, most of the changes have been quality of life upgrades, there's less clutter and more feedback

NOTE MOST OF THE FEEDBACK I WAS GETTING CAN BE SOLVED BY LOOKING IN THE OPTIONS MENU. THE CONTROLS CAN BE REBOUND, EVEN FOR GAMEPADS. YOU CAN TURN OFF SCREENSHAKE. YOU CAN CHANGE HOW YOU PICK UP ITEMS. THANK YOU!!!
